name: InvoiceInterimRequest
comment: This table contains all information on bill dates and bill content for interim bills. Interim bill means the adhoc bill requested by customer in between of bill cycle.
vf short description: This table contains all information on bill dates and bill content for interim bills. Interim bill means the adhoc bill requested by customer in between of bill cycle.

fields.name: InvoiceInterimRequestSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: InvoiceInterimRequestKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the Invoice Interim Request in aLDM. Each Invoice Interim Request Key value represents a unique Invoice Interim Request. //Optima:Generated Key Based on Invoice Interim Request Id and   Invoice Interim Request Reset Id

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BillingArrangementSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: InterimBillDate
fields.comment: Date that interim bill should be generated for this account. //Optima:CMF_INTERIM_BILLS.INTERIM_BILL_DATE

fields.name: IncludeNonRecurringChargeFlag
fields.comment: Calculate and include recurring charges in this interimbill? (1 = yes). //Optima:CMF_INTERIM_BILLS. INCLUDE_NRC

fields.name: IncludeRecurringChargeFlag
fields.comment: Include recurring charges in this interimbill? (1 = yes). //OptimaCMF_INTERIM_BILLS. INCLUDE_RC

fields.name: IncludePaymentFlag
fields.comment: Include payments in this interim bill? (1 = yes). //OptimaCMF_INTERIM_BILLS. INCLUDE_BMF

fields.name: IncludeAdjustmentFlag
fields.comment: Include adjustments in this interim bill? (1 = yes). //OptimaCMF_INTERIM_BILLS. INCLUDE_ADJ

fields.name: IncludeUsageFlag
fields.comment: Include usage charges in this interim bill? (1 = yes). //OptimaCMF_INTERIM_BILLS. INCLUDE_USAGE

fields.name: InvoiceInterimRequestId
fields.comment: This indicates the tracking ID, unique with Original server ID for interim bill for this account. //Optima:CMF_INTERIM_BILLS.TRACKING_ID

fields.name: InvoiceInterimRequestResetId
fields.comment: Original server ID to uniquely identify tracking_id. //Optima:CMF_INTERIM_BILLS.TRACKING_ID_RESET

fields.name: BillOrderNumber
fields.comment: Indicates the Bill order number. //Optima:CMF_INTERIM_BILLS. BILL_ORDER_NUMBER

fields.name: InterimBillStatementDate
fields.comment: Statement date for interim bill. //Optima:CMF_INTERIM_BILLS. STATEMENT_DATE

fields.name: InterimBillPaymentDueDate
fields.comment: Payment due date for interim bill. //Optima:CMF_INTERIM_BILLS. PAYMENT_DUE_DATE

fields.name: TenantId
fields.comment: Indicates the tenant Id from source. //Optima:CMF_INTERIM_BILLS. TENANT_ID

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
